news.title: POLYTOPIA NEWS
news.description:
Welcome!
 This is where we share the latest news from the Polytopia universe. Stay tuned!
gamemodepicker.title: How do you wanna play it?
tribepicker.title: Any specific tribe?
tribepicker.categories.specialtribes.des: A collection of tribes that are a notch above the rest...
tribepicker.underconstruction.descriptio: We are still working on these guys. Developing and shit. That takes time you know. Follow @Midjiwan on Instagram or Twitter to know when new tribes are done!
tribepicker.freetribe: Free loot. Have these guys on us!
tribepicker.freetribe.description: This tribe is available for free and cannot be purchased to enable online multiplayer.

gamemode.perfection.description.button: Show off globaly in the classic 30 turns game.
gamemode.perfection.description: Get the highest possible score before the time runs out.
gamemode.perfection.win: TIMES UP! How'd ya do? Not bad! You win this round I guess!
gamemode.domination.description.button: Kill all that stand in your way! Make the square turn red with the blood of the unworthy.
gamemode.domination.win: YESSSSS! BLOOD! KILL KILL KILL! DEATH DEATH DEATH! MUAGH HA HA HA HA!
gamemode.domination.loss: Weakling! I'm ashamed of your existence. Get out of my sight!
gamemode.glory.description: Just achieve {0} points to win. No more. No less.
gamemode.glory.win: BOOM! {0} points. You did it. GG.
gamemode.might.win: YESSSSS! BLOOD! KILL KILL KILL! DEATH DEATH DEATH! MUAGH HA HA HA HA!
gamemode.death: Weakling! I'm ashamed of your existence. Get out of my sight!
world.intro.title: DUUUUUDE, NO WAY!
world.intro.text: You got chosen to rule the {0} dudes. Explore the world and expand your empire, but be prepared to fight your closest friends to achieve your goal!
world.turn.end.question: Is it though?
world.turn.nomoves: You've done what you can, end your turn.
world.turn.waiting: {0} is being slow, give them a second to do their thing...
world.turn.waiting.unknown: Waiting for an unknown tribe to play...
world.unit.veteran: This dude has seen some shit.
world.unit.disembark.title: Abandon {0}
world.unit.disembark.message: Abandoning this guy will dismantle your {0}. Do you really wanna do that?
world.unit.evolve: Your unit has grown to a {0}!
world.unit.evolve.title: Unit Growth
world.building.capture.ready.title: Invading {0}!
world.building.capture.warning: That's your stuff! Don't let them have it! You've got till next turn to do something about this!
world.building.capture.warning.title: {0} is being invaded!
world.attract.sanctuary: A wild animal has showed up.
world.suggestion.title: Tip-Time!
world.suggestion.disable: (These suggestions can be switched off in the menu)
world.road.connected.title: Trade route connection added!
world.road.connected.message: {0} is now linked to your capital!
world.tech.new.title: New knowlege!
world.tech.new.message: You have learned the incredibly secret art of {0}
world.reward.building: Butch the architect designed {0} to celebrate this amazing achievement!
world.reward.building.title: {0} has been achieved
tribes.xin-xi.info:
They start their journey in the dense mountains, surrounded by beautiful cherry blossom.

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.imperius.info:
Huge mountains and green valleys. The climate there is perfect for growing fruit. 

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.bardur.info:
Surviving the harsh eternal winter of the scandinavian woods is not an easy task, but {0} seem to thrive here.

{0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.oumaji.info:
The seemingly endless, sun blessed desert is the home of the {0}.

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.kickoo.info:
White sandy beaches with coconut palms. Abundance of fruit and fish. Welcome to Jamaica. The 

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.hoodrick.info:
The yellow autumn leaves of the northern England woods are perfect hideouts for its peculiar mushroom stuffing inhabitants. 

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.luxidoor.info:
The {0} love expensive things, jewels, rare spices and exclusive ornaments. That is also why they are the most expensive tribe in Polytopia!

Their citizens lead very comfortable lives, draped in the finest purple silk. But will they survive outside the walls of their beloved capital?  

The {0} start the game with a level 2 capital.
tribes.vengir.info:
Frowned upon by the other tribes and pushed into the unpleasant wastelands. Will they tolerate this injustice or rise to fight back?  

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech and a powerful Swordman.
tribes.zebasi.info:
{0} thrive on the warm savannah, cultivating the rich soil to provide food for their mighty population. 

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.zebasi.news: All profits from the African tribe is invested in solar energy projects.
tribes.aimo.info:
The tranquil and wise {0} inhabit the harshest, windiest and highest mountain range of the square, where they have found inner peace by meditating in the eternal evening light. 

{0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.aquarion.info:
From the deep oceans a long lost civilization appears! Their extreme isolation has given them special aquatic abilities that are unknown to the other more human tribes.

The {0} have a slightly different tech tree and have access to the unique amphibious turtle units that no other tribe can train.
tribes.quetzali.info:
The {0}  worship the bird gods of the red soil and live in harmony with the natural symmetry of their cubistic jungles. They are commonly seen riding huge flightless birds. 

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.elyrion.info:
The mysterious {0} defend their woodland homes with colorful magic and the ferocity of fire-breathing dragons! 

They regard Nature as a holy spirit and cannot hunt animals or chop down trees, instead they start the game with the unique Enchantment tech that can turn regular animals into powerful monsters.
tribes.yadakk.info:
The {0} started out as a nomadic tribe in the beautiful harsh Khalee plains. Now they are the traders of the square, connecting their empire with impressive trade routes. 

The {0} start the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.polaris.info:
The {0} have lain trapped in the far reaches of the freezing tundra for eons, but were blessed by the unknowable Deer-Things with the power to expand their unnatural icy terrain farther than the weather permits. 

With the might of sleds and Mamoos, the mystical {0} are determined to entomb the Square in ice and transform the land into a frigid paradise. 

The {0} start the game with the ability to freeze surrounding terrain using Iceys.
building.capital.owner.former: {0} is the old capital of the {1} empire, currently occupied by {2}

building.ability.embark: Dudes get boatafied when on this tile
building.ability.route: It creates trade routes through {0} to any other {1} within a 5 tiles radius.
building.ability.road: Build roads to connect cities with the capital. Connected cities are bestowed 1 population as a reward. Roads also grant dudes a movement bonus when they travel along them.
building.ability.ruin: Possible loot, time to investigate! Go there and invade it.
building.ability.patina: {0} grows over time, so try to build them pretty early.
building.ability.limited: Zoning Laws State: Only one {0} per city.
building.ability.unique: You only have one {0}. Place it wisely.
building.restriction.near: Zoning Laws State: This must be built next to a {0}.
building.restriction.on: Zoning Laws State: This must be on a tile with {0}.

tooltip.tile.road: Build a path to link this city to your capital.
tooltip.tile.limit: This town is full, go away.
tooltip.tile.capture.tip: Move a guy here to 'borrow' this enemy city!
tooltip.tile.level.polaris: Freeze {0} more tiles to reach the next level
tooltip.tile.sailing: Move a guy here to hit the water!
tooltip.tile.ruin: Move a guy here and loot these ruins.
tooltip.tile.blocked: There is an enemy cockblocking you from this reascource.
tooltip.tile.extract.upgrade: Exract this resource to evolve your city
tooltip.tile.extract.convert: This resource can be transformed into a dude. Yeah, it's kinda dope.
tooltip.tile.extract.stars: Extract this resource to earn stars instantly, if you have a patience problem.
tooltip.tile.extract.research: You have no idea what this even is. Learn {0} to figure out what you are looking at.
tooltip.tile.outside: This thing is outside of your borders.
tooltip.tile.research: You need to research {0} to be able to move here
tooltip.tile.explore: Explore this area to see what it holds!
tooltip.unit.city.capture: Tap 'Capture' to add this town to your collection.
tooltip.unit.city.capture.next: This town will be ready to capture next turn
tooltip.unit.actions.none: Nothing left for you to do with this guy. Come back next turn.
tooltip.unit.actions.move: The little blue target things are where you can move to. Tap one.
tooltip.unit.actions.attack: Click a red mark to attack! Release your fury!
tooltip.unit.enemy: This is not one of your guys.
tooltip.unit.enemy.territory: This enemy is in your bubble space!
tooltip.unit.enemy.city: This enemy is getting a bit too big for his britches! Teach him a lesson!
tooltip.unit.grow.now: Be patient, this will grow {0} at the end of this turn!
tooltip.unit.decay.now: This thing will decay at the end of this turn.
tooltip.unit.decay.later: This thing will decay in {0} turns.
tooltip.ability.disband: Abondon any of your own guys and get half of its cost in return.
tooltip.ability.destroy: Recycle any building within your borders, great for reconstructing your empire in your own image.
tooltip.ability.literacy: Reduce the price of all technologies by 20%.
tooltip.ability.glide: All non skating guys get an extra move when moving on ice.
tooltip.ability.dash: This guy can attack after moving if there is an enemy within fightin' distance.
tooltip.ability.convert: This dude can convert an enemy to your own side by attacking it with propaganda.
tooltip.ability.escape: This dude can hightail it outa there after a scuffle.
tooltip.ability.persist: This guy can chain attacks as long as it kills each victim.
tooltip.ability.swim: This creature is amphibious and can move on both land and water.
tooltip.ability.carry: This thing is carrying another thing inside.
tooltip.ability.heal: This guy can heal surrounding dudes.
tooltip.ability.navigate: This guy can move in any terrain even if you do not have the knowledge needed to traverse that shit.
tooltip.ability.fly: This thing just kinda flys over any terrain with no movement penalties or bonuses.
tooltip.ability.splash: This guy causes splash damage to nearby enemies when attacking.
tooltip.ability.grow: This thing will eventually hit puberty and become something horrifying.
tooltip.ability.sneak: This guy can move past enemy units without stopping.
tooltip.ability.scout: This dude has double the vision range.
tooltip.ability.freeze: This dude freezes its enemies when attacking them so they cannot move.
tooltip.ability.freeze_area: This guy can freeze the surrounding tiles including any enemy units. Just straight up ices them
tooltip.ability.freeze_auto: This dude freezes any surrounding tiles and units when moving. He doesn't even have to think about it.
tooltip.ability.skate: This thing gets double movement on ice tiles but on land their movement is garbage.
tooltip.ability.fortify: This guy gets a defence bonus when defending in its own towns, double bonus with a town wall.

consent.approval.title: Welcome to Polytopia!
consent.approval.info: To improve Polytopia with usage statistics and to store your high scores and settings we need your approval to access to some personal data. You can read more about what data we collect in our privacy policy. (You can revoke your approval at any time in the 'Throne Room')
consent.enabled.info: You currently allow Polytopia to access some personal data to improve service and store your high scores etc. For more info, read our privacy policy.
consent.disabled.info: To save personal data like high scores and usage statistics we need you approval. For more info, read our privacy policy.
onlineview.title: MULTIPLAYER
onlineview.profile.available: Profile is only available when connected to the server.
onlineview.friendlist.available: Friend List is only available when connected to the server.
onlineview.servicedisabled: The multiplayer server is temporarily disabled, please try again later. Also make sure that you are using the latest version of the Battle of Polytopia.
onlineview.loaderror: Could not connect to the multiplayer server. Check your internet connection and try again.
onlineview.uptodate: All games are up to date
onlineview.intro.fix:
Hi {0}! 

To play online multiplayer there are a few things you need to fix:
onlineview.intro.update: Online multiplayer is not available, please update Polytopia to the latest version
onlineview.nogames.start: Let's get some online games going with your friends. Tap 'New game' to start one.
onlineview.nogames.first: The first thing you need is to connect with some other humans who play Polytopia. Tap 'Friends' to add them.
onlineview.passplay.start: Start a local Pass & Play game by tapping 'New Game'
onlineview.login.ios.info: Using {0} ensures that you have a unique and persistent Player ID that will keep your data safe across devices.
onlineview.notifications.info: We use notifications to communicate the status of your ongoing multiplayer games.
onlineview.purchase.info: Running an online multiplayer service costs real money and we rely solely on the kind support from players like you.
onlineview.clipboard.title: OK, ITS COPIED!
onlineview.game.resign.title: Yeah, I resign.
onlineview.game.resign.info: Coward. Wimp, Sore Loser. Are your really gonna leave, just like that?
onlineview.game.old.title: Old file version
onlineview.game.old.info: This game was created with an outdated version of the game. It can unfortunately not be loaded :( My suggestion is that you delete it and start a new one. Sorry for the inconvenience.
onlineview.game.player.left: {0} has left the game {1} and has been replaced by a bot.
onlineview.game.player.kicked: You have been removed from game {0}
onlineview.game.player.invited: You are invited to a new game, {0}

friendlist.new.title: Add a new friend
friendlist.new.info: Enter the player ID of your friend. (they can find it on this Friend page on their device)
friendlist.new.myself.title: Me, myself & I
friendlist.new.myself.info: Seems like you tried to add yourself as a friend. That might sound like a nice thing to do but it would add an existential layer to the game that we cannot handle at the moment. Please submit a player ID of someone else.
friendlist.new.empty.title: Emptiness
friendlist.new.empty.info: The player ID you entered was completely empty! You should not try to make friends with the void, it is a very lonely path.
